entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
